description: Dive into "Sun-Kissed Shores of Athens" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Sun-Kissed Shores of Athens

reviews.text: Great beach like to paddle here

A bit of litter around and some traffic noise, however limited free straw umbrellas and a change room.

Some seaweed and a bit rocky going out, but lots of rocks and seaweed to explore not too far out.

It's an OK public beach with a huge amount of traffic noise. Unkept umbrellas. Plastic bottle tops, cigarette butts and other rubbish that litters the sand along with rotting sea grass in many places. A large storm drain empties onto one end of the beach. Ugly tattered by the wind, disintegrating plastic taupes put up by people on metal frames for shade from the sun are an eyesore. Nice for a quick swim or snorkel. A bit ugly when looking inland from the water. Is not your tranquil holiday escape for sure and is by far not a very beautiful place even though photos might suggest. I still came most days on my visit as it's not too bad.

places.generalDescription: Voula Beach, located near Glyfada, offers both a public free beach area and a paid section with sunbeds and parasols. The beach is known for its cleanliness and friendly staff who speak English. It's a great spot for families as it's less crowded, making it easier to keep an eye on kids in the shallow waters with gentle waves. The paid section provides amenities such as sunbeds, umbrellas, food and drinks at the bar, showers, and toilets.
places.name: Voula Beach

reviews.text: Very nice beach, more of a beach club rather than a public beach, you pay 9 euros for entrance fee. A set of 2 sun beds and umbrella is 42 euros, service was very good and you have a good space between sun beds so you have privacy. There is a small area for people who don't want to purchase a sun bed. We really had a great and relaxing time. Reachable with bus

We had a great day at the beach here . 50e for set if sunbeds and umbrella ( 2nd row). While food is not anything special, the stuff is very friendly and attentive. The restaurant/bar is beautiful, sunbeds are cozy. Shallow water, ideal for relaxed day at the beach.
Beautiful beachfronts ranging from sand to pebble. My daughter spent HOURS sorting through rocks to find the prettiest souvenir. Clean water, calm tides, and lots of sunshine.

places.generalDescription: √âdem is a popular beach located near the Athens city center, situated between Palio Faliro and Alimos. Its central location makes it a favorite spot for both swimmers and those who enjoy leisurely strolls along the seafront promenade. The area also offers access to two smaller beaches. Additionally, visitors can indulge in delicious local cuisine at nearby eateries, where they can savor gyros, souvlaki, and other Greek specialties while enjoying the vibrant street life.

sources.snippet: Edem, the nearest beach to Athens‚Äô city center, stretches along the boundary between Palio Faliro and Alimos. This organized sandy beach often attracts crowds due to its central location. The area is popular not only with swimmers but also with those strolling along the seafront promenade, which leads to two smaller beaches.
sources.shortName: Athens' Best Beaches: Island Vibes Without the Boat Ride

places.name: √âdem

reviews.text: Your friendly gyros and souvlaki cornershop. Not fancy, sitting outside in the streetlife on simple furniture, but the food is delicious, and the service fast and always super friendly. Going there again and again, or order takeaway/delivery.
Fabulous food, service, value.  Deserves a much higher than the 4.2 star rating (as of Mar 2022).
A Very good Take Out and pleasant sitting outdoor watch the üåç go by... Lots of choices for both meat & Vegetarians...

places.address: Leof. El. Venizelou 49, Nea Smirni 171 23, Greece
